item.title: Topic Modeling and Sentiment Analysis on Tweets
item.description: Objective Data collection Discussion of the methodology Data processing Topic modeling using LDA Additional analysis: Sentiment analysis on Rohingya topic Overall finding and discussion Twitter is a popular source for minning social media posts. In this article I harvested tweets that had mention of ‘Bangladesh’, my home country and ran two specific text analysis: topic modeling and sentiment analysis. The overall goal was to understand which topics related to Bangladesh are popular among the Twitter users and derive some understanding about the sentiments that they expressed through their tweets.
